game.name: Byte Survivor
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Enter the world of gaming and earn! Earn a living through a game that mines cryptocurrency, acquire new PCs and avatars, and obtain better rewards. It is a top-down, roguelike action game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter the world of gaming and earn! Earn a living through a game that mines cryptocurrency, acquire new PCs and avatars, and obtain better rewards. It is a top-down, roguelike action game.
